## Game.initTicker() method

add main render method to ticker

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
initTicker(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

the method added to ticker will called in each requestAnimationFrame, 1. call update method on all gameObject 2. call lastUpdate method on all gameObject 3. call update method on all system 4. call lastUpdate method on all system
